Class Employee

java.lang.Object
Employee
class Employee
extends java.lang.Object
Employee is an object that holds an employee's identifying information and their sales history in the form of a SalesRecord object.
Author:
Raymond Shum

    • setSaleIDs

      private void setSaleIDs()
